title: System Integration Lead
summary: System Firmware & Diagnostics Group has an immediate opening for a System Integration Lead. Our team is part of the system hardware development organization responsible for bringing new and exciting hardware products with the best quality to the users through innovation.
description: In this role you will be working with the multi-functional team to architect, coordinate definition and execution of system level integration tests targeted for hardware qualification by way of deep diving into the hardware architecture and analyzing metrics reported by these tests...
key_qualifications: Validated understanding of embedded hardware components and hardware/software interactions, Strong background in computer architecture, bus technologies (such as I2C, SPI) and IO protocols (such as PCIe, USB), Strong background with scripting and programming skills in Python, Lua and Objective C...
education_experience: -  BS Electrical/Computer Engineering or relevant work experience (MS is a plus)
